MacroOp.Name: OMNI_STR_WIDEN
MacroOp.Brief: A helper macro used to 'widen' strings.
MacroOp.Description: If the OMNI_UNICODE flag is defined this helper macro will expand string literal values to their 'wide' representation. That is to say that OMNI_STR_WIDEN("Some character string") will expand to L"Some character string" if the OMNI_UNICODE flag is defined at compile @_time, otherwise it expands to the value passed to the macro ("Some character string" in this example). To use a shortened version of this macro, you can use OMNI_STRW.
MacroOp.Synopsis: A helper macro used to 'widen' strings based on Unicode definitions (if non-Unicode build this expands to the value passed in)
